titleStmt.title: Musica transalpina Cantus. The second booke of madrigalles, to 5. & 6. voices: translated out of sundrie Italian authors & newly published by Nicolas Yonge.
Musica transalpina. Book 2.
titleStmt.author: Yonge, Nicholas, d. 1619.

notesStmt.note: Six partbooks, each with separate dated title page and register. Third word of title, part 2, "Altus"; part 3, "Tenor"; part 4, "Quintus"; part 5, "Sextus"; part 6, "Bassus".
Signatures: [A]² B-D⁴; [A]² B-D⁴; [A]² B-D⁴; [A]² B-D⁴; [A]² B⁴; [A]² B-D⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
